comment.author: 고상호
comment.content: client who is currently looking for strong individuals in the java world and they should have team lead experience.

post.content:
Are you interested in this position? The agent looks at person who has over 5 years Canadian experience. You can mention my name if you want to apply for the position.
=========================================================== www.comnetix.com Location: Mississauga/Oakville
ComnetiX' principal business is the provision of advanced biometric, hardware-independent, FBI standards-based verification and identification software solutions. Since its inception in 1980, the company has become a leader in the development of state of the art networked criminal intelligence systems. ComnetiX' mission is to provide positive identification solutions and by doing so we hope to empower private, corporate, and government departments by providing them with industry proven multi-mode biometric identification solutions.
This position will be part of the Engineering Department and will report to the Director of Development. This person will help build and maintain any current and new products that are required by the company. Needing a candidate to have good experience and would like a senior person who can lead projects.
To qualify, candidates must have the following technical requirements: minimum of 5yrs technical experience with Java/J2EE, HTML, XML/XSL, JavaScript, Struts framework; design patterns, UML; Oracle. Candidate must have a university diploma, minimum 5yrs experience with object oriented methodologies, and a minimum 5yrs experience working with Project management methodology. Candidate must be familiar with application maintenance methodologies, techniques and tools and must have the ability to work in a high paced environment. Candidate must also have strong leadership ability. Candidates must be able to lead small development teams and have experience leading projects of similar scope.
SKILLS: Java, J2EE (JSP, Servlet, EJB, etc), Struts, XML/XSL, HTML, Javascript, Oracle & SQL, UML, VC++, WebServices, JBoss/Websphere/WebLogic, Performance Tuning & Clustering, .Net
Angeline __________________________________________________________________ Angeline Yuen-Pitre Senior Staffing Consultant, Information Technology (416) 483-7424 ext. 257 FAX: (416) 483-7676
__________________________________________________________________ DATALIST 55 Eglinton Avenue East, Suite 605, Toronto, Ontario M4P 2H9 INTERSECTION: Yonge & Eglinton
post.title: minimum of 5yrs technical experience with Java/J2EE, HTML, XML/XSL etc.
